game.name: Truck Loads Simulator 3D
game.description:
Forget all whatever you did in the past and get ready to enter a completely new driving experience! Can you dare to accept this challenge? If yes, this brand new racing challenge gives you something really exciting and engaging. This time you do not have a small car to drive, but a heavy truck to control. You have to pick up the cargo and deliver it at a destined location in Truck Loads Simulator 3D. Do not worry how to play since the controls are pretty simple to understand.

In this one of best online driving challenges from the popular categories of cargo truck games, you would be allowed to play the role of a cargo truck transport driver. Choose your truck, load it with the luggage and try to get all the cargo delivered on the destined location before the time expires in this HTML5 truck game! Check your speed by keep your eyes on the right side of the screen where the speed meter is displaying! Watch is displaying on the top left corner of the screen.

Be careful since lots of speed breakers on the road and some sharp turns will also make your driving a bit tough! Make sur to deliver your luggage without dropping the load to the endpoint. This cool car racing game features easy controls and popular traditional music of Rabab which has gained immense popularity throughout the Middle East, East Asia & Central Asia. Guide your truck through different addictive levels! Check out other top truck driving and load-carrying games on atmegame.com for free!
